animeTitle: Meet in Rebirth: An Exclusive For You and Me
otherNames: 重生相逢：给你我的独家宠溺
synopsis: Reborn back to the age of seventeen, Yun Xiangwan vowed not to be bullied again. She beat a scumbag and married a high-profile man, but was forced to accept a man with leg problems. Yun Xiangwan was ridiculed and ridiculed. But a man held her in his palm, others humiliated her and returned it ten times, and others deceived her and returned a hundred times. One day, Yun thought about it and was shocked: "You can walk?" The man looked innocent: "I never said that I can't walk."
